param.name: appliance_hostname
param.doc: Host name of the appliance.

method.name: PUT
method.doc: To update (replace) the current authentication configuration with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the management authentication resource URI.

param.name: Authorization
param.doc: Basic Authentication header

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: type
param.doc: Specifies whether the local user database or the remote LDAP user registry is used for authentication. If this parameter is set to local, then all other fields are ignored. The value is local or remote.

param.name: ldap_host
param.doc: Specifies the name of the LDAP server. This parameter is required if type is remote.

param.name: ldap_port
param.doc: Specifies the port over which to communicate with the LDAP server. This parameter is required if type is remote.

param.name: enable_ssl
param.doc: Specifies whether SSL is used when the system communicates with the LDAP server. The value is true or false.

param.name: key_database
param.doc: Specifies the name of the key database file (without any path information). This parameter is required if enable_ssl is set to true and type is remote.

param.name: cert_label
param.doc: Specifies the name of the certificate within the Key database that is used if client authentication is requested by the LDAP server.

param.name: user_attribute
param.doc: Specifies the name of the LDAP attribute which holds the supplied authentication user name of the user. This parameter is required if type is remote.

param.name: group_member_attribute
param.doc: Specifies the name of the LDAP attribute which is used to hold the members of a group. This parameter is required if type is remote.

param.name: base_dn
param.doc: Specifies the base DN which is used to house all administrative users.

param.name: admin_group_dn
param.doc: Specifies the DN of the group to which all administrative users must belong.

param.name: anon_bind
param.doc: Specifies whether the LDAP user registry supports anonymous bind. If set to false, bind_dn and bind_password are required. The value is true or false.

param.name: bind_dn
param.doc: Specifies the DN of the user which will be used to bind to the registry. This user must have read access to the directory. This parameter is required if anon_bind is false and type is remote.

param.name: bind_password
param.doc: Specifies the password which is associated with the bind_dn. This parameter is required if anon_bind is false and type is remote.

param.name: ldap_debug
param.doc: Specifies whether the capturing of LDAP debugging information is enabled or not. The value is true or false.

param.name: enable_usermapping
param.doc: Specifies whether mapping of the incoming client certificate DN is enabled. The value is true or false. Only valid if type is set to remote.

param.name: usermapping_script
param.doc: Specifies the javascript script that will map the incoming client certificate DN. The script will be passed a Map containing the certificate dn, rdns, principal, cert, san and the user_attribute, group_member_attribute and base_dn from this configuration. If not specified a default script is used. Only valid if type is set to remote and enable_usermapping is true.

param.name: enable_ssh_pubkey_auth
param.doc: Specifies whether or not users in the LDAP server can log in via SSH using SSH public key authentication. If this value is not provided, it will default to false.

param.name: ssh_pubkey_auth_attribute
param.doc: Specifies the name of the LDAP attribute which contains a user's public key data. This field is required if SSH public key authentication is enabled.

param.name: oidc_client_id
param.doc: The OIDC Client Identifier. This field is required if type == "federation".

param.name: oidc_client_secret
param.doc: The OIDC Client Secret. This field is required if type == "federation".

param.name: oidc_discovery_endpoint
param.doc: The OIDC Discovery (well-known) endpoint. This field is required if type == "federation".

param.name: oidc_enable_pkce
param.doc: Specifies whether the Public key Code Exchange extension is enforced. This field is required if type == "federation".

param.name: oidc_enable_admin_group
param.doc: Specifies whether a user must be a member of a particular group to be considered an administrator user. This field is required if type == "federation".

param.name: oidc_group_claim
param.doc: The OIDC token claim to use as group membership. This claim can either be a String, or a list of Strings. The default value is "groups".

param.name: oidc_admin_group
param.doc: The name of the group which a user must be a member of to be considered an administrator user. The default value is "adminGroup".

param.name: oidc_user_claim
param.doc: Specifies the OIDC token claim to use as the username. The default value is "sub".

param.name: oidc_keystore
param.doc: The SSL Truststore to verify connections the the OIDC OP. The default value if "lmi_trust_store".

param.name: enable_tokenmapping
param.doc: Specifies whether custom claim to identity mapping is performed using a JavaScript code fragment. This field is required if type == "federation".

param.name: tokenmapping_script
param.doc: The custom JavaScript code fragment to map an identity token to a username/group membership.
